param.name: io_il
param.label: A list of input images. First (n-1) bands should contain the predictor. The last band should contain the output value to predict.
param.help: A list of input images. First (n-1) bands should contain the predictor. The last band should contain the output value to predict. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: jpeg, png, tiff

param.name: io_csv
param.label: Input CSV file containing the predictors, and the output values in last column. Only used when no input image is given

param.help: Ratio between training and validation samples (0.0 = all training, 1.0 = all validation) (default = 0.5).

tool.help: This application trains a classifier from multiple input images or a csv file, in order to perform regression. Predictors are composed of pixel values in each band optionally centered and reduced using an XML statistics file produced by the ComputeImagesStatistics application. The output value for each predictor is assumed to be the last band (or the last column for CSV files). Training and validation predictor lists are built such that their size is inferior to maximum bounds given by the user, and the proportion corresponds to the balance parameter. Several classifier parameters can be set depending on the chosen classifier. In the validation process, the mean square error is computed between the ground truth and the estimated model. This application is based on LibSVM and on OpenCV Machine Learning classifiers, and is compatible with OpenCV 2.3.1 and later.
